page.title: 07ELMBRIDGE - GENERAL FARMING
page.content: A pig farm can be found in the area. There is a broiler unit for 1100 chickens and a turkey unit for a 1000 birds. The land is largely owned by the occupiers. Many farms are a family concern where it is hoped that a son will follow his father. A number of farm houses have been sold off with a few acres,to business men. A fourteen acre Equestrian Centre with twenty four loose boxes has an indoor and outdoor school. A farrier living at Cooksey Green travels with a mobile forge where needed. An agricultural contractor undertakes all types of work from combine harvesting, hedge-cutting to ploughing. All his cars and tractors are in contact with the house by citizen band to help with the organisation of the work. Many farmers make use of this contractor thus saving on there own labour.
